about_the_game:
Recurrence is a classic survival horror game set in a cyberpunk world caught in a time loop, where time, humanity and technology converge in a spiral of mystery and terror.

Discover the truth behind the loop.

In a future corrupted by a strange signal, you will step into the shoes of Vera, a researcher who awakens in the body of a replicant. Explore a strange world that has succumbed to the influence of a cosmic horror. Solve puzzles, confront mechanical horrors and unravel the origins of the signal that started it all.

The loop changes everything.

Each repetition offers new opportunities to explore, learn and survive. As time marches on and the world crumbles, you'll discover clues that only exist at specific times and events that unfold in unexpected ways.

A classic horror adventure.

Recurrence pays homage to survival horror greats like Silent Hill and Resident Evil, combining classic mechanics with a modern take. With fixed cameras, brain-teasing puzzles and retro-style graphics that capture the essence of the classics, you'll experience a nostalgic and revamped horror experience.

Prepare to face your deepest fears on a journey where time is not your ally and every cycle could be your last. Can you break the loop?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
